safetyTips: Pay in advance by card on Uber and Delivery Driver respects Social distancing.
name: THE LITTLE TEAPOT
description: We are a family run Tea Room in Park Mall, Ashford, Kent. Registered with Ashford Borough Council and have been awarded again with a five star rating from environmental health. We offer a full range of high quality, Teas, Coffees and other beverages, both hot and iced.  We specialise in home cooked/prepared breakfasts/lunch and delicious home baking and delight in serving beautifully presented Cream/High Teaâ€™s.  We have designed our menu, mindful of those with special dietary requirements and are child friendly. Currently open as a Takeaway with a reduced menu. Deliveries and collection available via Uber Eats.
